description: Shock aka Ariel Tremmore is a fictional character, and a supervillain in the Marvel Comics universe, first introduced in 1993 on March 1, created by Dan G. Chichester and Scott McDaniel. A psychopathic killer, she has fought with Daredevil in his side of New York City.As Shock, Ariel possesses the power to induce fear and hallucinations in other people by releasing pheromones through her skin.
name: Shock
